user_query: I want to surprise my mom with a special dinner for her birthday. Can you recommend some top-rated restaurants in our city? Also, find me some YouTube videos about cooking delicious meals to get ideas for the birthday dinner. Lastly, provide me with the current exchange rate between US dollars and British pounds to plan the budget.

TaskList.description: Recommend top-rated restaurants in the user's city for a special birthday dinner.
Find YouTube videos about cooking delicious meals for birthday dinner ideas.
Provide the current exchange rate between US dollars and British pounds.
